mapper.select: select * from reply where rv_num = #{rv_num} order by re_num
mapper.insert: insert into reply(re_num, mem_id, rv_num, re_content, re_regdate) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{rv_num}, #{re_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update reply set re_content=#{re_content}, re_regdate=sysdate where re_num=#{re_num}
